SenStore::ArraySlice

Overview

struct ArraySlice

Array slice.

Used By

ArraySliceList

Data Member Index

start
Start index (0-based, inclusive).
step
Step size (<=1 indicates all elements between start (inclusive) and stop (exclusive).
stop
Stop index (0-based, exclusive).

Data Members

int start;

Start index (0-based, inclusive).

int step;

Step size (<=1 indicates all elements between start (inclusive) and stop (exclusive).

int stop;

Stop index (0-based, exclusive).
